item.title: Welcome !
item.description: Welcome to my personal website. It has been written while learning to use Hugo, a static site generator. This website is using Hugo-Geo Theme to render the web page. You will find here various information, and even maybe some blog articles like this one ! If you want to make your own website and enjoy hacking, you must definitely check out the Getting Started Tutorial of Hugo and find out if it suits to your needs.
